snippet: Flat Out powered past the field with a five-wide sweep to win the $500,000 Cigar Mile at Aqueduct in New York.
abstract: Thoroughbred race horse Flat Out powers past the field with a five-wide sweep to win the $500,000 Cigar Mile at Aqueduct in New York.
lead_paragraph: Flat Out powered past the field with a five-wide sweep to win the $500,000 Cigar Mile at Aqueduct in New York.
